name: Adaptability
flavor_text: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

name: Aerilate
flavor_text: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Aftermath
flavor_text: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Air Lock
flavor_text: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Analytic
flavor_text: Boosts the power of the Pokémon’s move if it is the last to act that turn.

name: Anger Point
flavor_text: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

name: Anger Shell
flavor_text: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Anticipation
flavor_text: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

name: Arena Trap
flavor_text: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.

name: Armor Tail
flavor_text: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon’s head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

name: Aroma Veil
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from effects that prevent the use of moves.

name: As One
flavor_text: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s Unnerve Ability and Glastrier’s/Spectrier’s Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh Ability.

name: Aura Break
flavor_text: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

name: Bad Dreams
flavor_text: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.

name: Ball Fetch
flavor_text: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

name: Battery
flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

name: Battle Armor
flavor_text: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Battle Bond
flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, its bond with its Trainer is strengthened, and its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.

name: Beads of Ruin
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Beast Boost
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat every time it knocks out a target.

name: Berserk
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to drop to half or less.

name: Big Pecks
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.

name: Blaze
flavor_text: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Bulletproof
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s HP is restored when it eats any Berry, in addition to the Berry’s usual effect.

name: Chilling Neigh
flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Chlorophyll
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Clear Body
flavor_text: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Cloud Nine
flavor_text: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Color Change
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

name: Comatose
flavor_text: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack while in its sleeping state.

name: Commander
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

name: Competitive
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

name: Compound Eyes
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.

name: Contrary
flavor_text: Reverses any stat changes affecting the Pokémon so that attempts to boost its stats instead lower them— and attempts to lower its stats will boost them.

name: Corrosion
flavor_text: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.

name: Costar
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally’s stat changes.

name: Cotton Down
flavor_text: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Cud Chew
flavor_text: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

name: Curious Medicine
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

name: Cursed Body
flavor_text: May disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.

name: Cute Charm
flavor_text: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

name: Damp
flavor_text: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.

name: Dancer
flavor_text: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.

name: Dark Aura
flavor_text: Powers up the Dark-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

name: Dauntless Shield
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Dazzling
flavor_text: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

name: Defeatist
flavor_text: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Defiant
flavor_text: If the Pokémon has any stat lowered by an opposing Pokémon, its Attack stat will be boosted sharply.

name: Delta Stream
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes the weather so that no moves are supereffective against the Flying type.

name: Desolate Land
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

name: Disguise
flavor_text: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

name: Download
flavor_text: The Pokémon compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

name: Dragon's Maw
flavor_text: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

name: Drizzle
flavor_text: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Drought
flavor_text: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Dry Skin
flavor_text: Restores the Pokémon’s HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

name: Early Bird
flavor_text: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

name: Earth Eater
flavor_text: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Effect Spore
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

name: Electric Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Electromorphosis
flavor_text: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

name: Embody Aspect
flavor_text: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Speed stat to be boosted.

name: Emergency Exit
flavor_text: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Fairy Aura
flavor_text: Powers up the Fairy-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

name: Filter
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

name: Flame Body
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

name: Flare Boost
flavor_text: Powers up special moves when the Pokémon is burned.

name: Flash Fire
flavor_text: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

name: Flower Gift
flavor_text: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of the Pokémon and its allies in harsh sunlight.

name: Flower Veil
flavor_text: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

name: Fluffy
flavor_text: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

name: Forecast
flavor_text: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

name: Forewarn
flavor_text: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

name: Friend Guard
flavor_text: Reduces damage dealt to allies.

name: Frisk
flavor_text: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.

name: Full Metal Body
flavor_text: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Fur Coat
flavor_text: Halves the damage from physical moves.

name: Gale Wings
flavor_text: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s Flying-type moves while its HP is full.

name: Galvanize
flavor_text: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Gluttony
flavor_text: If the Pokémon is holding a Berry to be eaten when its HP is low, it will instead eat the Berry when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Good as Gold
flavor_text: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon’s status moves.

name: Gooey
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Gorilla Tactics
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

name: Grass Pelt
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Grim Neigh
flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Guard Dog
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

name: Gulp Missile
flavor_text: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

name: Guts
flavor_text: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

name: Hadron Engine
flavor_text: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Harvest
flavor_text: May create another Berry after one is used.

name: Healer
flavor_text: Sometimes cures the status conditions of the Pokémon’s allies.

name: Heatproof
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s heatproof body halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves.

name: Heavy Metal
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.

name: Honey Gather
flavor_text: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

name: Hospitality
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP.

name: Huge Power
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

name: Hunger Switch
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

name: Hustle
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but lowers its accuracy.

name: Hydration
flavor_text: Cures the Pokémon’s status conditions in rain.

name: Hyper Cutter
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s prized, mighty pincers prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

name: Ice Body
flavor_text: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in snow.

name: Ice Face
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.

name: Ice Scales
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

name: Illuminate
flavor_text: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

name: Illusion
flavor_text: The Pokémon fools opponents by entering battle disguised as the last Pokémon in its Trainer’s party.

name: Immunity
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

name: Imposter
flavor_text: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.

name: Infiltrator
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s moves are unaffected by the target’s barriers, substitutes, and the like.

name: Innards Out
flavor_text: When the Pokémon is knocked out, it damages its attacker by the amount equal to the HP it had left before it was hit.

name: Inner Focus
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Insomnia
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Intimidate
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

name: Intrepid Sword
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Iron Barbs
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s iron barbs damage the attacker if it makes direct contact.

name: Iron Fist
flavor_text: Powers up punching moves.

name: Justified
flavor_text: When the Pokémon is hit by a Dark-type attack, its Attack stat is boosted by its sense of justice.

name: Keen Eye
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

name: Klutz
flavor_text: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

name: Leaf Guard
flavor_text: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

name: Levitate
flavor_text: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

name: Libero
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Light Metal
flavor_text: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.

name: Lightning Rod
flavor_text: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

name: Limber
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

name: Lingering Aroma
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Lingering Aroma.

name: Liquid Ooze
flavor_text: The strong stench of the Pokémon’s oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.

name: Liquid Voice
flavor_text: Sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

name: Long Reach
flavor_text: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

name: Magic Bounce
flavor_text: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

name: Magic Guard
flavor_text: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

name: Magician
flavor_text: The Pokémon steals the held item from any target it hits with a move.

name: Magma Armor
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.

name: Magnet Pull
flavor_text: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from fleeing by pulling them in with magnetism.

name: Marvel Scale
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.

name: Mega Launcher
flavor_text: Powers up pulse moves.

name: Merciless
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

name: Mimicry
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

name: Mind's Eye
flavor_text: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

name: Minus
flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

name: Mirror Armor
flavor_text: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

name: Misty Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Mold Breaker
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Moody
flavor_text: Every turn, one of the Pokémon’s stats will be boosted sharply but another stat will be lowered.

name: Motor Drive
flavor_text: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Electric-type moves. Instead, its Speed stat is boosted.

name: Moxie
flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it shows moxie, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Multiscale
flavor_text: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

name: Multitype
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the plate it holds.

name: Mummy
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.

name: Mycelium Might
flavor_text: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Natural Cure
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s status conditions are cured when it switches out.

name: Neuroforce
flavor_text: Powers up the Pokémon’s supereffective attacks even further.

name: Neutralizing Gas
flavor_text: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

name: No Guard
flavor_text: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

name: Normalize
flavor_text: All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Oblivious
flavor_text: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Opportunist
flavor_text: If an opponent’s stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

name: Orichalcum Pulse
flavor_text: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Overcoat
flavor_text: The Pokémon takes no damage from sandstorms. It is also protected from the effects of powders and spores.

name: Overgrow
flavor_text: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Own Tempo
flavor_text: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.

name: Parental Bond
flavor_text: The parent and child attack one after the other.

name: Pastel Veil
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

name: Perish Body
flavor_text: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

name: Pickpocket
flavor_text: The Pokémon steals the held item from attackers that make direct contact with it.

name: Pickup
flavor_text: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

name: Pixilate
flavor_text: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Plus
flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

name: Poison Heal
flavor_text: If poisoned, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Poison Point
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

name: Poison Touch
flavor_text: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

name: Power Construct
flavor_text: Cells gather to aid the Pokémon when its HP drops to half or less, causing it to change into its Complete Forme.

name: Power Spot
flavor_text: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

name: Power of Alchemy
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Prankster
flavor_text: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s status moves.

name: Pressure
flavor_text: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

name: Primordial Sea
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

name: Prism Armor
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

name: Propeller Tail
flavor_text: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Protean
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Protosynthesis
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

name: Psychic Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Punk Rock
flavor_text: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

name: Pure Power
flavor_text: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

name: Purifying Salt
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

name: Quark Drive
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

name: Queenly Majesty
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

name: Quick Draw
flavor_text: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

name: Quick Feet
flavor_text: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

name: RKS System
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

name: Rain Dish
flavor_text: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

name: Rattled
flavor_text: The Pokémon gets scared when hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type attack or if intimidated, which boosts its Speed stat.

name: Receiver
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Reckless
flavor_text: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

name: Refrigerate
flavor_text: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Regenerator
flavor_text: The Pokémon has a little of its HP restored when withdrawn from battle.

name: Ripen
flavor_text: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: Rivalry
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

name: Rock Head
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Rocky Payload
flavor_text: Powers up Rock-type moves.

name: Rough Skin
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it.

name: Run Away
flavor_text: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Sand Force
flavor_text: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Rush
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Spit
flavor_text: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it’s hit by an attack.

name: Sand Stream
flavor_text: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Sand Veil
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm.

name: Sap Sipper
flavor_text: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Grass-type moves. Instead, its Attack stat is boosted.

name: Schooling
flavor_text: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

name: Scrappy
flavor_text: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It is also unaffected by Intimidate.

name: Screen Cleaner
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

name: Seed Sower
flavor_text: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

name: Serene Grace
flavor_text: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

name: Shadow Shield
flavor_text: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

name: Shadow Tag
flavor_text: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.

name: Sharpness
flavor_text: Powers up slicing moves.

name: Shed Skin
flavor_text: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Sheer Force
flavor_text: Removes any additional effects from the Pokémon’s moves, but increases the moves’ power.

name: Shell Armor
flavor_text: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Shield Dust
flavor_text: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

name: Shields Down
flavor_text: When its HP drops to half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

name: Simple
flavor_text: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon’s stat changes.

name: Skill Link
flavor_text: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

name: Slow Start
flavor_text: For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

name: Slush Rush
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in snow.

name: Sniper
flavor_text: If the Pokémon’s attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.

name: Snow Cloak
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in snow.

name: Snow Warning
flavor_text: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

name: Solar Power
flavor_text: In harsh sunlight, the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat is boosted, but its HP decreases every turn.

name: Solid Rock
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

name: Soul-Heart
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.

name: Soundproof
flavor_text: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

name: Speed Boost
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s Speed stat is boosted every turn.

name: Stakeout
flavor_text: Doubles the damage dealt to a target that has just switched into battle.

name: Stall
flavor_text: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.

name: Stalwart
flavor_text: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Stamina
flavor_text: Boosts the Defense stat when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

name: Stance Change
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King’s Shield.

name: Static
flavor_text: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.

name: Steadfast
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.

name: Steam Engine
flavor_text: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

name: Steelworker
flavor_text: Powers up Steel-type moves.

name: Steely Spirit
flavor_text: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

name: Stench
flavor_text: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

name: Sticky Hold
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

name: Storm Drain
flavor_text: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

name: Strong Jaw
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

name: Sturdy
flavor_text: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

name: Suction Cups
flavor_text: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.

name: Super Luck
flavor_text: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

name: Supersweet Syrup
flavor_text: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.

name: Supreme Overlord
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

name: Surge Surfer
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Swarm
flavor_text: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Sweet Veil
flavor_text: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep.

name: Swift Swim
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Sword of Ruin
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Symbiosis
flavor_text: The Pokémon passes its held item to an ally that has used up an item.

name: Synchronize
flavor_text: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.

name: Tablets of Ruin
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Tangled Feet
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness if it is confused.

name: Tangling Hair
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Technician
flavor_text: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

name: Telepathy
flavor_text: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.

name: Teravolt
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Thermal Exchange
flavor_text: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

name: Thick Fat
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Tinted Lens
flavor_text: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

name: Torrent
flavor_text: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Tough Claws
flavor_text: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

name: Toxic Boost
flavor_text: Powers up physical moves when the Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Toxic Chain
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.

name: Toxic Debris
flavor_text: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

name: Trace
flavor_text: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

name: Transistor
flavor_text: Powers up Electric-type moves.

name: Triage
flavor_text: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s healing moves.

name: Truant
flavor_text: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it spends the next turn loafing around.

name: Turboblaze
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Unaware
flavor_text: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target’s stat changes.

name: Unburden
flavor_text: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon’s held item is used or lost.

name: Unnerve
flavor_text: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

name: Unseen Fist
flavor_text: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

name: Vessel of Ruin
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Victory Star
flavor_text: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.

name: Vital Spirit
flavor_text: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Volt Absorb
flavor_text: If hit by an Electric-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Wandering Spirit
flavor_text: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Water Absorb
flavor_text: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Water Bubble
flavor_text: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves that hit the Pokémon and prevents it from being burned.

name: Water Compaction
flavor_text: Boosts the Defense stat sharply when the Pokémon is hit by a Water-type move.

name: Water Veil
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s water veil prevents it from being burned.

name: Weak Armor
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s Defense stat is lowered when it takes damage from physical moves, but its Speed stat is sharply boosted.

name: Well-Baked Body
flavor_text: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

name: White Smoke
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

name: Wimp Out
flavor_text: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Wind Power
flavor_text: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

name: Wind Rider
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

name: Wonder Guard
flavor_text: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

name: Wonder Skin
flavor_text: Makes status moves more likely to miss the Pokémon.

name: Zen Mode
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Zero to Hero
flavor_text: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
